reviewText: How can you go wrong with the list of riders? You cant.
This is a CD we got for our teen snowboarder.  Great flick and one that can be watched a number of times.

Thanks for the speedy :-) - but expensive :-(  sending to Switzerland.
This Christmas gift was very appreciated,
I hope to get also some of the best DVD in 2013

This video is most likely the best board video I have ever had the pleasure of seeing. This video has a lot of park and I love that and has a lot of back country it was sooooooo good if you board you must buy!
If you love rails...get it.  If you think they're repetitive and boring and prefer snowboarding that occurs on a mountain, this may not be for you.

This was a Christmas gift for my Grandson who is 16. After he opened the package, he ran to the DVD player and all of us watched it. Exiting stuff. Later in the day some of his friends came over and Black Winter was watched again--several times. The following day saw all the guys heading to the mountains with their boards. This DVD was a big hit, as was Grandma.
